thread.section_title: Royal Park Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: It was a'ight.
thread.title_full: It was a'ight. - Review of Royal Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: WhirlDLeewise
title: It was a'ight.
text:
-Close to a main subway station, very nice.
-Close to Walgreens, 7/11 and RELATIVELY close to Central Park.
-Cheap as chips
-Very comfy bed
-Bathroom shared was clean
-Room wasnt clean
-Sheets were a bit dirty
-Nothing of use in the room
Overall, was okay. Not clean, but it was cheap and good enough for the stay. 5/10, would possibly stay again.
